ygData.subject: Re: Hrmmm..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Speaking of what some SOB could do to you: Someone could bind affinity to you where you would get killed after getting killed. If you have a pet and
ygData.messageBody:
Enigma wrote:
> >From: Enigma <enigma@...>
>
> Ummm K not even close, there are a bunch of exploits in the game. I personally watch to see what some SOB is going to do to me next.
>

Speaking of what some SOB could do to you:

Someone could "bind affinity" to you where you would get killed after getting killed.

If you have a pet and someone makes you invisible, the pet goes away.
